original_text: Other people were saying, ‘It is Elijah that has come back.’ Some other people were saying, ‘This is one of God's prophets who lived a long time ago. Now he has become alive again.’
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 엘리야가 나타났다고도 하며 어떤 사람은 옛 선지자 한 사람이 다시 살아났다고도 함이라

sentences.original_text: It is Elijah that has come back
This is one of God's prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 이분은 하나님의 선지자 중 한 분이다

sentences.original_text: who lived a long time ago
Now he has become alive again
